Region: adding the following to improve redundancy and performance:

Group hierarchy: - Enabled Multi-AZ deployment for the Amazon RDS for MySQL to provide near zero RTO/RPO issues when failing over from one AZ to another.
- Setup Multi-site deployment in another region to provide the best RTO/RPO in the event of a region wide failure in the primary region.
- Multi-site deployment also allows traffic to be load balanced across the two regions providing increased capacity for handling any additional traffic load
Region: as well as improved performance by using Route53 latency based routing and ensuring customers traffic are routed to the closest region.
